function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of face mask detection in thermal imaging","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in public spaces","Mitigation":"Implement face mask detection algorithms in the thermal imaging system","Technologies":"Deep learning-based object detection algorithms","People":"Public in public spaces","Owner":"System developers and administrators"},{"Description":"Inaccurate body temperature measurement due to clothing interference","Impact":"Misinterpretation of body temperature and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Develop algorithms to filter out temperature readings from clothing and focus on skin temperature","Technologies":"Deep learning-based temperature measurement algorithms","People":"Individuals getting temperature checked","Owner":"Health organizations and system developers"},{"Description":"Low accuracy of thermal imaging for body temperature measurement","Impact":"Ineffective detection of individuals with elevated body temperature, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improve the accuracy and reliability of the thermal imaging system through advanced calibration and validation methods","Technologies":"Advanced thermal imaging technology","People":"Individuals in public spaces","Owner":"System developers and administrators"}]}
